---

_Mood boards for sound._

* Films, games, shows used as audio inspiration
* Sound packs to use/avoid
* Benchmark soundscapes (e.g., Hades for combat, Celeste for UI)
* Playlists for composers/sound designers
* Target mixes for different game states
